title: Sell Dominus Estate
metaTitle: Sell Dominus Wine | Christian Moueix | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Dominus Estate wine. We buy Napanook and Dominus from Christian Moueix. Direct offers for Napa Valley collectibles.
introParagraph: Produced by Christian Moueix of Chateau Petrus fame, Dominus is a Bordeaux-styled masterpiece from the historic Napanook vineyard in Yountville. We purchase all vintages of Dominus, especially high-scoring years like 1991, 1994, 2010, and 2013.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Ulysses (distinct estate, though we may buy collection)
pricingFactors: Vintage score (2013 was Wine Spectator #1 Wine of the Year)

faqs.question: Do you buy Napanook?
faqs.answer: Yes, Napanook is the second wine of the estate and is a solid value we purchase.

faqs.question: Is the 2013 vintage special?
faqs.answer: Yes, 2013 was awarded 100 points and named Wine of the Year, making it highly collectible.

faqs.question: Do you buy Othello?
faqs.answer: We buy Othello if it is part of a larger Dominus collection.

faqs.question: How does Dominus age?
faqs.answer: Dominus is built for the long haul. We buy vintages from the 1980s and 90s that are drinking perfectly now.

faqs.question: Who owns Dominus?
faqs.answer: It is owned by Christian Moueix, who also managed Petrus in Pomerol.

faqs.question: Do you buy 6-pack wood cases?
faqs.answer: Yes, Dominus often ships in 6-bottle wood cases, which are desirable for collectors.
